attributes.action: Restrict the constant depressing charity/funeral adverts on TV.
attributes.additional_details: In a world where mental health problems are getting out of hand, we do not need this constant negative attitude towards raising money. There are better ways to raise money in a positive way.
attributes.background: There are far too many depressing adverts on TV. They should be either banned or restricted.

rejection.details:
The issues raised in this petition are a matter for Ofcom and the Advertising Standards Authority, not the UK Government or Parliament. You can find out more here: 

https://www.ofcom.org.uk/

https://www.asa.org.uk/
